Package se.swedenconnect.opensaml

Class OpenSAMLSecurityDefaultsConfig

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.opensaml.OpenSAMLSecurityDefaultsConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
OpenSAMLInitializerConfig
public class OpenSAMLSecurityDefaultsConfig extends Object implements OpenSAMLInitializerConfig
Initializer that modifies OpenSAML's default algorithms as returned by DefaultSecurityConfigurationBootstrap with the caller's own wishes for security defaults.
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)
